item.name: JACKET CANVAS SPECIAL EDITION BIG SHARK
item.description: The JACKET CANVAS SPECIAL EDITION BIG SHARK combines eco-friendly style with a bold design. Made from 100% organic cotton in Portugal, it features a durable 390 g/sqm fabric, pigment-dyed finish, and practical front pockets. The standout: a large shark patch on the back for an adventurous touch.

item.name: Jacket la dolce vita
item.description: Stay relaxed and stylish all summer long with the Jacket La Dolce Vita. This relaxed jacket embodies the carefree spirit of the Italian "dolce vita" lifestyle. Cozy texture made small cors. Perfect for any summer adventure. Designed in collaboration with Joana Astolfi.

item.name: PANTS CORDS MECCA
item.description: We love corduroy's durability and warmth, so we've tailored our pants to be comfortable and versatile. Ideal for colder days, these pants add interest and texture to any occasion. With an elastic waist, the pants have a tapered fit, complete with two side and two back pockets.

item.name: Pants la dolce vita
item.description: Unwind and embrace the Italian lifestyle with our PANTS LA DOLCE VITA. Perfect for a relaxed summer, these pants will transport you to a state of leisure and enjoyment. With an elastic waist, the pants have a tapered fit, complete with two side and two back pockets. Experience the sweet life for yourself with these stylish and comfortable pants. Designed in collaboration with Joana Astolfi.

item.name: SWEATPANTS CHARCOAL
item.description: Cut from 100% organic Plush cotton, our medium-weight sweatpants are designed to be comfortable and stylish with a relaxed fit. Team yours with the matching hoodie and a timeless Essential t-shirt.

item.name: Shorts
item.description: Cut from 100% organic Plush cotton-jersey, these light-weight walkshorts are designed to be comfortable and stylish with a relaxed fit. Team yours with our timeless Essential t-shirt and a Zip hoodie.

item.name: WALKSHORTS LEOPARD GREEN
item.description: comfy, stylish, sustainable

item.name: Hoodie Cru
item.description: Cut from 100% organic Plush cotton, our hoodie is the perfect piece to wear after a late surf session...

item.name: Sweatshirt Zip Stoned
item.description: We love spending our days in our sweatshirts, which is why we added a zipper to make this piece even more versatile while also keeping its iconic design and function. Cut from medium-weight cotton, this piece features an inside-out section for added comfort and warmth.

item.name: Graphic T-Shirt
item.description: Our Graphic T-Shirt features a bold shark print on an off-white base. Made from soft, breathable cotton, it combines comfort with a playful, adventurous style. Perfect for adding a standout touch to any casual look.

item.name: LONG SLEEVE TERRY STONED
item.description: Dive into style with our Long Sleeve Stripes Black/Off-White Shark. Featuring bold stripes and unique shark prints—a low-key front detail and a standout graphic on the back. Made from premium Portuguese cotton, it's designed for comfort and durability. Pair it with jeans or layer it up for a laid-back look.

item.name: Long Sleeve Striped T-Shirt
item.description: Dive into style with our Long Sleeve Stripes Black/Off-White Shark. Featuring bold stripes and unique shark prints—a low-key front detail and a standout graphic on the back. Made from premium Portuguese cotton, it's designed for comfort and durability. Pair it with jeans or layer it up for a laid-back look.

item.name: North Atlantic T-Shirt
item.description: Cut from our signature 100% organic Flamê cotton, the Atlantic t-shirt pays homage to what inspires us the most - the ocean.

item.name: Ocean Life T-Shirt
item.description: Ride the tide with our Charcoal "Ocean Life" T-Shirt. Featuring a striking "Ocean Life" print in mecca on the front, this tee delivers laid-back coastal vibes with a modern edge. Made from premium Portuguese cotton for all-day comfort, it's an easy choice for a fresh, relaxed look.

item.name: Vest Cru
item.description: The Perfect Layer: Our New Vest Made from plush organic cotton for all-day comfort and style. Sleek, minimalist, and versatile—your go-to for any occasion.

item.name: Sweatpants
item.description: comfy and sustainable.

item.name: Jogging Shorts
item.description: comfy and sustainable.

item.name: Core Sleeveless Performance Top
item.description:
Turn up the heat. Built to show off your gains, this slim-fit tank keeps you cool with its lightweight, sweat-wicking fabric.- Perfect for crushing your workouts while looking sharp. 
- Sleeveless 
- Slim fit 
Lightweight and medium compression

item.name: Tote bag
item.description: Meet the Everyday Tote Bag. The one bag you'll want to wear all Summer long. Crafted from 435 g/sqm of the same Everyday Denim Jeans fabric for optimal consumption, it does not follow a dyeing process, meaning any harmful chemicals, no colors, not even natural dyes. Just 100% Organic Cotton.

item.name: Beer Pint Beige Hat
item.description: Made with a classic and relaxed silhouette, our Denim Cap is cut from the same Denim Work Jacket and Jeans Undyed fabric for optimal consumption. It does not follow a dyeing process, meaning any harmful chemicals, no colors, not even natural dyes. It has a gently curved peak and comes with a fun twist embroidered.

item.name: Blue Chair Beige Hat
item.description: Made with a classic and relaxed silhouette, our Denim Cap is cut from the same Denim Work Jacket and Jeans Undyed fabric for optimal consumption. It does not follow a dyeing process, meaning any harmful chemicals, no colors, not even natural dyes. It has a gently curved peak and comes with a fun twist embroidered.

item.name: ISTO Hat
item.description: Made with a classic and relaxed silhouette, our Cap is cut from the same Work Jacket fabric for optimal consumption. Same production batch color. Same peachy touch. It has a gently curved peak and, well, our first visible logo. Let's use it properly and take good care.

item.name: Merino Wool Beanie
item.description: Knitted from 100% Extra-Fine Merino Wool, this double folded, extra-soft yet structured Beanie is crafted from luxury Italian yarns and carefully knitted by our portuguese specialist Orfama. Everything to keep you warm on that winter night or stylish at the party. Mulesing-free.

item.name: Seagul Blue Hat
item.description: Made with a classic and relaxed silhouette, our Denim Cap is cut from the same Denim Work Jacket and Jeans Undyed fabric for optimal consumption. It does not follow a dyeing process, meaning any harmful chemicals, no colors, not even natural dyes. It has a gently curved peak and comes with a fun twist embroidered.

item.name: White Chair Blue Hat
item.description: Made with a classic and relaxed silhouette, our Denim Cap is cut from the same Denim Work Jacket and Jeans Undyed fabric for optimal consumption. It does not follow a dyeing process, meaning any harmful chemicals, no colors, not even natural dyes. It has a gently curved peak and comes with a fun twist embroidered.

item.name: Curduoy Jacket
item.description: With the same fit as our classic Work Jacket and a premium Italian fabric, this Jacket has an unparalleled vintage charm but with a modern twist. Pair it with our Pleated Corduroy Trousers and there you have it: The ultimate outfit that can seamlessly transition from a 1970s jazz club to a modern-day urban cafe.

item.name: Deadstock Blazer
item.description: After the first round's success (thanks to you), we took another deep dive into the hidden treasures of Diniz and Cruz to save more deadstock fabrics and make ultra-rare and unrepeatable Blazers. And now, as one of our top clients, you're getting first access. These Blazers aren't making it to the shelves just yet. Instead, they're available to a closed group of the previous rounds' main supporters. Order now, and in two weeks, your chosen one-of-a-kind piece will be in your hands - before anyone else even knows they exist.

item.name: Heavy Wool Jacket
item.description: Meet a chunkier take on a classic: our iconic Recycled Wool Work Jacket. Crafted from the same Manteco's renowned MWool® (Recycled Wool) in Italy, this Jacket is heavier than ever, with 590 g/sqm. With its slightly more relaxed fit, it's perfect for layering season. And thanks to a zero-waste production process and a closed-loop recycling system that continuously reuses wool, we can say that, paired with a timeless design and next-level warmth, it also reinforces our brand mission.

item.name: Quilted Wool Jacket
item.description: The Quilted Jacket is a smart blend of fabric innovation and design. Crafted with Amni Soul Eco®, a cutting-edge biodegradable polyamide yarn designed by Fulgar that decomposes in approximately five years in anaerobic landfill conditions, significantly faster than conventional fibers, and reduces the impact of microplastics in the environment. It maintains high performance throughout a garment's life, offering lightness and breathability to this piece. It features recycled poly padding for warmth and details using deadstock corduroy fabric from our Corduroy Shorts. The fit? Relaxed, so you can layer it up nicely.

item.name: Recycled Work Jacket
item.description: Made of 100% Recycled Wool (MWool® by Manteco - the next generation of recycled wool, obtained by recycling highly-selected post-consumer garments and pre-consumer leftovers), this Jacket is an ultra-premium and enduring piece on every men's wardrobe. It features all the natural characteristics of virgin wool but has the lowest impact possible. This Midweight Jacket is perfect for mid-season. For wintery weather, we recommend some extra layers for additional warmth and comfort. With our regular Work Jacket silhouette and elegant two front pockets, this version should age beautifully throughout the years due to its Recype® color process - no added dyes and chemicals; the colors are created by mixing numerous and different shades of recycled wool fibers.

item.name: Denim Trousers
item.description: Composed of a 12 3/4 Oz Italian organic cotton selvedge denim woven on rare shuttle looms from Candiani, these high-density jeans create a more straightforward, clean and sophisticated look. An extremely soft yet durable fabric that makes it ideal for a timeless piece.

item.name: Pleated Corduroy
item.description: Italian fabric at its best, with a classic cut that is versatile enough to look casual or formal depending on circumstances. You choose. Tapered fit to perfection. Can be paired with our Corduroy Work Jacket for an elevated look combining style and comfort.

item.name: Wool Trousers
item.description: Tailored warmth, fully regenerated. Meet the Wool Trousers - these pleated, tapered-fit trousers are made from 100% Recycled Wool (MWool® by Manteco). What this means? You'll get all the warmth and comfort of virgin wool but with a fraction of the environmental impact. At 400 g/sqm, they strike the perfect balance between heft and ease, ideal for colder days. And the cherry on top: they can be paired with our Wool Jackets. Same fabric, same tone, same high-quality without compromising on price point.

item.name: Camp-Collar Linen Shirt
item.description: Description of Camp-Collar Linen Shirt

item.name: Cashmiere Shirt
item.description: Designed to be worn all year long, this lightweight flannel shirt is made from a crisp blend of organic cotton and cashmere for ultra soft touch. A relaxed fit with a button-down collar. Win-win.

item.name: Oxford Shirt
item.description: To deliver a unique Oxford Shirt we worked with the best garment supplier and tailor in Portugal to achieve the utmost distinctiveness. It sounds fancy, because it is. Made of heavy 150 g/sqm organic cotton cloth that manages to feel light and breathable when worn, our Oxford Shirt is unrivaled in its attention to detail, from cuffs to buttons, and sewing. Measure wise, we looked for a perfect intersection between a classical fit and a slimmer design, just enough for it to be worn on every occasion.

item.name: Shirt Checked Flannel
item.description: Crafted with the same top-notch craftsmanship, comfort, and timeless style as all our Checked Flannels, this comes with a fresh twist. We've teamed up with our friends at Somelos to pull out deadstock fabric and designed new pockets to add a touch of novelty to the Flannel collection.

item.name: Striped Linen Shirt
item.description: Cut from a premium 100% natural fabric, our Striped Linen Shirt comes in a relaxed fit, a buttonless collar, custom bio resin buttons and just the right shoulder length to get the sleeve height where it needs to be. Nailing it was far from simple, but now it's all yours.

item.name: Curduroy Shorts
item.description: Are you looking for versatility? Maybe you want a pair of shorts that you can wear to the beach and then to the beach club afterward? Well, meet the Corduroy Shorts you will wear all summer long. Made with organic cotton, they have an intentionally oversized fit for a more relaxed look.

item.name: Linen Shorts
item.description: Fresh, lightweight and breathable. all you can ask for a pair of Shorts to keep up with the hot weather. Made of 100% Linen, these Linen Shorts are ready to be your favorite summer everyday uniform.

item.name: Shorts
item.description: Chino Shorts: a forever summer classic staple. We just perfected the mold and made them available at an affordable price. Made with Certified GOTS Organic Cotton in Portugal.

item.name: Cotton Socks
item.description: Socks Description

item.name: Cashmiere Sweater
item.description: Combed by hand from pure mongolian mountain goats, our Cashmere Sweater is the ultimate luxury staple of our permanent collection. We've chosen the longest and finest fibres - from world-famous Italian mill Cariaggi - to obtain the strongest yarn. Everyday comfort to use with or without layers.

item.name: Cotton Sweater
item.description: Made with best-in-class 100% organic cotton from Italy, this sweater is carefully knitted at our specialized knitwear Portuguese supplier Orfama. With a half-cardigan fit and soft hand feel, it is the perfect staple to cozy you up 365 days a year.

item.name: Heavy Wool Sweater
item.description: Crafted from a Luxury 100% Heavy Merino Wool fabric, this chunky 5gg fully fashioned Sweater is ready to become your everyday essential during wintery weather. With a straight and relaxed fit, it can be worn with or without additional layers but one thing is for sure: it can go through several weather conditions and stay impeccable. This is a guaranteed though one, test it out.

item.name: Hoodie
item.description: Carefully constructed from a beautiful organic diagonal loopback French Terry, this Hoodie features a handy front pocket for maximum comfort and a relaxed double-layer hoodie that will help it stand the test of time. Mid to high 380 g/sqm jersey for an extra luxury touch.

item.name: Swim shirts
item.description: Our Swim Trunks are crafted using a unique fabric called Seaqual, which is made up of 10% recycled plastic from the sea and 90% recycled polyester from post-consumer waste. This eco-friendly fabric, along with recycled polyester for stretchness, makes our Swim Trunks the perfect summer companion. As a first approach to swimwear, we aimed to create a classic and timeless addition to every man's wardrobe.

item.name: Breton
item.description: A sophisticated approach to the classic marinaire. Crafted from a premium midweight jersey with horizontal stripes and long sleeves. An iconic piece perfect for anytime of the year. Every year.

item.name: Classic T-Shirt
item.description: The Organic Cotton used in the production of this Classic T-Shirt is GOTS certified. The Global Organic Textile Standard (GOTS) is the worldwide leading textile processing standard for organic fibres, including ecological and social criteria, backed up by independent third-party certification of the entire textile supply chain.

item.name: ISTO X SLOP HEAVYWEIGHT T-SHIRT
item.description: Crafted in collaboration with SLOP Magazine, this T-Shirt perfectly blends a relaxed yet classic fit with luxurious 270 g/sqm jersey, made from 100% Organic Cotton (GOTS Certified). The story behind? Funny enough, it all started during a late-night conversation about Portuguese food wonder, which took them to visit us and try some of the best seafood out there; leading to the main inspiration behind this piece and special embroidery.

item.name: ISTO x lts
item.description: The Heavyweight T-Shirt embodies the perfect blend between a more relaxed (yet still a classic) fit and comfortable style. Crafted from a heavy 270 g/sqm Jersey composed of 100% Organic Cotton, this time it features the coolest print designed by Portuguese illustrator Lourenço Providência, a visual thinker and peace maker — there's nothing quite like the absolute peace we felt when discovering his work through minimalist, understated yet highly conversational artwork. Explore a collection of exclusive line illustrations inspired by the harmony between humans and nature.

item.name: Ringer T-Shirt
item.description: With the same fit as the Classic T-Shirt, the Ringer T-Shirt features a beautiful Navy ribbed collar. Still a classic collar. And just the right shoulder length to get the sleeve height where it needs to be.

item.name: Striped T-Shirt
item.description: comfy and sustainable

item.name: White T-Shirt
item.description: Meet the Supima T-Shirt: straight from the best suppliers in Portugal and crafted from an extra long staple SUPIMA® cotton, this midweight (yet-the-best-thing-you-will-wear-in-years) T-Shirt has a straight cut and a classic fine-ribbed neckline for extra comfort. The SUPIMA® cotton represents less than 1% of cotton grown in the world and reinforces our brand mission: durability, softness and color retention. Perfect to be worn on every occasion.

item.description: Keep yourself warm from the subtle breeze.

item.description: keep your belongings safe at all time!!!

item.name: Recycled Messenger Bag
item.description: Crafted from recycled marine plastic and made in Portugal, this lightweight bag was designed to accommodate more than just your essentials. It features two outer pockets: one is a discreet side pocket to keep your valuables at hand, and the other pocket has a drawstring closure where you can fit your water bottle. The adjustable strap allows you to wear the bag comfortably either on your shoulder or crossbody, always keeping your essentials close at hand and secure.
